Sentencas: The storage of fluctuating renewable energy is critical to increasing its utilization.
Titulo: Design and Evaluation of Hydrogen Energy Storage Systems Using Metal Oxides

Sentencas: In this study, we investigate an energy conversion and storage system with high energy density, called the chemical looping solid oxide cell (CL-SOC) system, from the integrated perspectives of redox kinetics and system design.
Titulo: Design and Evaluation of Hydrogen Energy Storage Systems Using Metal Oxides

Sentencas: The proposed system generates electricity, reproduces hydrogen, and stores it via metal oxide redox reactions in combination with a standard pressure fluidized bed reactor and a reversible solid oxide cell (SOC).
Titulo: Design and Evaluation of Hydrogen Energy Storage Systems Using Metal Oxides

Sentencas: We conducted redox kinetic analyses of Fe supported on an Fe-doped calcium titanate carrier in redox reaction using the modified shrinking core model and determined the scale of a fluidized bed reactor by developing the numerical Kunii-Levenspiel reactor model.
Titulo: Design and Evaluation of Hydrogen Energy Storage Systems Using Metal Oxides

Sentencas: Furthermore, the SOC redox system was modeled to estimate the round-trip efficiency and the system cost.
Titulo: Design and Evaluation of Hydrogen Energy Storage Systems Using Metal Oxides

Sentencas: The CL-SOC system achieved a stable hydrogen charge and discharge rate operation (i.e., constant redox reaction rate) in the fluidized bed reactor.
Titulo: Design and Evaluation of Hydrogen Energy Storage Systems Using Metal Oxides

Sentencas: It also achieved the reduction of system cost compared to the conventional high-pressure hydrogen storage system.
Titulo: Design and Evaluation of Hydrogen Energy Storage Systems Using Metal Oxides

Sentencas: In addition, the levelized cost of storage, including electricity costs, was calculated, and the advantage was also discussed.
Titulo: Design and Evaluation of Hydrogen Energy Storage Systems Using Metal Oxides

Sentencas: In this way, this study describes the integrated method of the CL-SOC system evaluation, which will provide a guide for material and system design.
Titulo: Design and Evaluation of Hydrogen Energy Storage Systems Using Metal Oxides
